title: Fee/fine actions schema
description: Transactions or activities associated with a user fee/fine account

dateAction.description: Date and time the transaction of the fine/fee was created

typeAction.description: Type of activity including the type of transaction

comments.description: Additional information entered as part of the activity or on this screen as a 'Staff info only' activity

notify.description: A flag to determine if a patron should be notified or not

balance.description: Calculated amount of remaining balance based on original fee/fine and what has been paid/waived/tranferred/refunded

transactionInformation.description: Number or other transaction id related to payment

createdAt.description: Location where activity took place (from login information)

source.description: Person who processed activity (from login information)
